title: 12-year-old boy is charged after he 'sexually assaulted a teacher'
text:
A twelve-year-old has been charged with 'sexually assaulting his teacher. (Getty)

A twelve-year old boy has been charged for allegedly sexually assaulting a teacher at a secondary school in Glasgow.

The child was arrested at an address in Glasgow after the reported assault, which happened at a school in the city on August 29th.

Police Scotland continue to investigate.

"A 12-year-old boy has been charged in connection with an alleged sexual assault which occurred in a school in Glasgow on Thursday, August 29.

"A report has been sent to the Children's Reporter," a spokesman for Police Scotland said today.

The child cannot be named for legal reasons.

A spokesman for Glasgow City Council said: "As this is a police investigation it would be inappropriate to comment further."

The school has not yet been identified.
